website_summaries.verdict: A 21 by 12-inch, 120 volt, black, two-burner electric cooktop with analog controls.
pros: Kenyon's Caribbean cooktop features two 6.5-inch, 1200 watt burners in a smooth black cooktop that is easy to clean
The unit has fast-heating ribbon elements that are controlled by push-to-turn infinite analog control knobs
cons: Rarely, there is an issue with quality control or damage from shipping, but the company provides great customer service

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Timely shipping. Shipping box has not enough meterial to support . I was feared that it might already broken. Thankfully it was not. I found slightly small than i expected. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Rajan Ghimire

customer_reviews.title: Works great. My tenant loves it
customer_reviews.text: Had one installed in a backyard cottage 8 years ago.I broke it when replacing the countertop recently and got the same one.Works great.My tenant loves it..
customer_reviews.author: Leisa  in Seattle

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: After 4 months the front eye stopped heating. After 1yr the back stopped. I'm single and don't cook much. The white paint on the knobs wore out after cleaning only a few times. But it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor B

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived broken - was promptly replaced and works very well for a mini kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Violet L. Weinberg

customer_reviews.title: Used twice.  Lasted 5 days before both burners died.
customer_reviews.text: Easy installed on Saturday. Looks good and tested on Sunday. Tried to use on Monday and burner 1 wasn’t working so only used burner 2. On Tuesday, used burner 2 for about 5 minutes before it died. Disappointed but not surprised. Now let’s see how the Warranty process goes.
customer_reviews.author: Peters Pence

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to install and is super good heating up. No issues with electricity since is a 110 wats.
customer_reviews.author: Karina Perez

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Heats up quickly. Used in a boat. Dimensions are less than noted
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect choice for a cooktop!
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for same type unit which had the glass top broken while in use. Works and looks Great! 110V makes this a perfect choice where 220V is not available.
customer_reviews.author: Retired Beach Bum

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks amazing on my Absolute Black granite counter-top for my in-law unit.
customer_reviews.author: phillip lam

customer_reviews.title: Nice clean look
customer_reviews.text: Fit my existing counter top with only minor cutting. Works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: This just plug and played right into the old space. So happy Amazon had this. Love that this heavy thing shipped Prime Free!!
customer_reviews.author: PDW

customer_reviews.title: smooth cooking
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a rental, so far so great. I have not used it personal so I can't discuss how it performs. Looks seeks also.
customer_reviews.author: One

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my basement bar. Usually cook eggs in the morning but will cook anything. It does require a small skillet or pot, but I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cooker. Purchased for a Garden apartment, and just want no baking by my tenants in my apartments...I made a great choice here.
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette Myers

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: Was prefect for the boat, much better price than marine supply store.
customer_reviews.author: CJ Oskowski

customer_reviews.title: Just Cooking
customer_reviews.text: Needed to open the hole in my countertop by 5/8" to get it to fit, but it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis O'Neill

customer_reviews.title: Great. Perfect for the mini kitchen I built in ...
customer_reviews.text: Great . Perfect for the mini kitchen I built in the basement .
customer_reviews.author: Vince T.

customer_reviews.title: Setting a high standard for product design!
customer_reviews.text: My Kenyon induction cooktop is to be installed tomorrow. As a career-long designer, my Kenyon decision was made largely because of the elegance of the minimalist approach to the control graphics. If the product is half as good as its graphics design it will be great! A tip of the hat to the people at Kenyon. And of course, as always, to everyone who contributes to making Amzon the multi-discipled professionals that you are. Thanks you, John M. Lavery
customer_reviews.author: John M Lavery

customer_reviews.title: I was so exited when I got it and installed ...
customer_reviews.text: I was so exited when I got it and installed but it only last two months. It won't even get worn. I lost my money :(
customer_reviews.author: SigNature Beu

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install for the DIY person
customer_reviews.text: Though you have to be careful with the glass top and chipping on the edges, this unit installed in no time and was easy and straight forward. Had a bit of a time finding one, but it was the exact match to a broken unit that I had to replace. All in all an easy install, and great working little stove. Used in a guest cabin and perfect for a small kitchen
customer_reviews.author: C. Bell

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful appliance and it fit perfectly in our countertop - ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful appliance and it fit perfectly in our countertop - easy to install and works like a champ!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Except if your pots or pans are to ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Except if your pots or pans are to big you can't cook on both at the same time. The nobs melted a little since my pan was to big.
customer_reviews.author: everiel

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, easy to install, looks great, haven't used it yet. Installation manual under plastic which they tell you to leave in place until after it is installed. The plastic is to protect the cooktop.
customer_reviews.author: Ken R

customer_reviews.title: Pretty simple process
customer_reviews.text: NOTE: IT COMES with a cord, however you have to attach a plug at the end. Pretty simple process, but it is a step I wasn't ready for.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki Sutherland

customer_reviews.title: Great little thing
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in my full size galley Manhattan kitchen. Note that it needs to be hard-wired so if you don't have outlet ready, that will be an added cost to get one by licensed electrician.
customer_reviews.author: Gordana Jovicevic

customer_reviews.title: perfect for our guest house kitchenette
customer_reviews.text: perfect for our guest house kitchenette. Need to be hardwired, had a handyman do that for me as I don't play with electrical! So far 5 stars, we'll see how time resistant this little one is.
customer_reviews.author: Tom.B

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous cooktop!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cooktop for my mother's guest house 9 years ago. It has functioned flawlessly. Heats quickly, cleans easily. After 9 years of daily use, she dropped something heavy on it and it broke the surface. I am on line now, because I intend to buy another one just like it! I had never heard of the Kenyon brand when I purchased this 9 years ago, but today I went in search of it. Great to see that it is an American company making a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Elisa

customer_reviews.title: HEY AMAZON!
customer_reviews.text: WHERE are all the photos the first reviewer "N.S." submitted. Sounded interesting and useful. Plus "N.S." took the time and initiative to be helpful so you should support that for the good of the community.
customer_reviews.author: jj

customer_reviews.title: Huge mistake
customer_reviews.text: We replaced our old cooktop burner in our RV with this one. Biggest mistake ever, it takes for ever and a day to be able to get it hot enough to cook. The first time it was used, was a few months after we installed. Half and hour to boil some eggs is ridiculous if you ask me.
customer_reviews.author: Bvas

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars.
customer_reviews.text: Not bad if you want to go at this price level
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Bush

customer_reviews.title: Amazing experience!!!
customer_reviews.text: Something I appreciate day in and day out. This discovery is amazing
customer_reviews.author: Tyrell	Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cooktop
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent burner, it arrived in good condition and installing it was a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Cata-San

product_meta.title: Kenyon B41601 6-1/2-Inch Caribbean 2-Burner Cooktop with Analog Control UL, 120-volt, Black
product_meta.description: Style Name:CooktopWith clean graphics and effortless operation, the Caribbean elegantly combines value with virtue. Smooth clear black glass, durable and easy to clean, with safety features uniquely Kenyon. Both one and two burner models available in 120, 208, or 240 volts, with push-to-turn controls, infinite heat control and quick-to-heat radiant ribbon elements. Safety features include heat limiting cooking surface protectors and On indicated light for each burner and a Hot burner indicator light. And as all Kenyon products, backed by uncompromising quality and an exclusive 3-year replacement warranty.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
